byline: Bruce Johnson, Sally Herships, Mitchell Hartman, Stan Alcorn, Sam Beard, Mark Garrison, Martin Patience and Queena Kim
teaser: Will the EU cut back aid to Egypt? The U.S. tries to get Japan to buy more American cars. And China tries to lure private equity investors to Tibet.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, August 19, 2013
